= ZINBA Installation =

Here you will find instructions to install the Zinba software package into  <a href="http://cran.r-project.org/" >R</a>.  It is assumed that you already have R installed.  

== Linux ==
Open a terminal and copy and paste the block of commands below into a terminal to automate the installation process.

{{{
wget http://zinba.googlecode.com/files/zinba_2.0.tar.gz
tar -xzvf zinba_2.0.tar.gz
R CMD INSTALL zinba
R
install.packages(c('multicore','doMC','foreach','qvalue','quantreg')) 
library(zinba)
}}}



== Mac ==

Open a terminal and copy and paste the block of commands below into a terminal to automate the installation process.  Important: you must run R from the terminal, do not use the R.app GUI as you will experience problems with Zinba

{{{
curl -O http://zinba.googlecode.com/files/zinba_2.0.tar.gz
tar -xzvf zinba_2.0.tar.gz
R CMD INSTALL zinba
R
install.packages(c('multicore','doMC','foreach','qvalue','quantreg')) 
library(zinba)
}}}
